import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const Navbar = () => { const [open, setOpen] = useState(false); const navLinkClasses = "px-4 py-2 border border-black bg-white text-black hover:bg-black hover:text-white transition-all duration-300 rounded transform hover:scale-110"; return (
{/* Logo / Brand */}
The Himalayan Vista
{/* Mobile menu button */}
{/* Desktop navigation */}
Home Room Full Personal Space Bike Rental Explore Himachal Contact Us
{/* Mobile navigation (dropdown) */} {open && (
Home Room Full Personal Space Bike Rental Explore Himachal Contact Us
)}
); }; export default Navbar;
